pr_title: [#2180] Fix NPE if ResourceIdentifier string is empty

timeline.message:
[#2180] Fix NPE if ResourceIdentifier string is empty.

Improve error handling by explicitly checking for an empty
string when creating a ResourceIdentifier.
Fix exception handling and javadoc comments concerning
resource addresses.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText:
Added null check:
If target were null, there would be an IllegalArgumentException thrown by the addProperties method here (already in the code before this PR).
timeline.author: calohmn
